Hellplague:
 
The Sweep commander nervously chuckled, she didn't quite expect her master responce.  But she got what she wanted: to have some real fun with her new toy.
"Thank you, Master.  I will start right away!" 

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Unicron:

"If your brainwasher doesn't is anough convincent, YOU and an he 
will be junk, Hellplague" said menazing Unicron


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "I'll make it work!" Hellplague shouted, determined.  "It will 
work, or I'll scrap him myself!  Besides, he can't go anywhere 
anyway!  He's pinned down where he is, so he can't cause any trouble 
here."
> Hellplague was cocky, but also the most reliable Minion, so she 
was confident she could proceed with her plans.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Unicron:
> 
> "Brainwashing can fail... "snarled Unicron "and I don't likje 
> enemies inside this place..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > "I'm... not sure, but I have a good idea how.  If his body is 
> resiliant, then we have to attack him psychologically.  Mind games 
> should be useful.  I will need time to figure his personality, I 
> need to know him.  If I can figure him out, then I can brainwash 
> him.  Then, you will have a perfect servant: never tiring, 
powerful, 
> intelligent, almost indestructable.  A Perfect Herald of Unicron!"
> > Hellplague was sure she was right, Malice could be powerful, and 
> hers.  Her pet would be the greatest destroyer and she could prove 
> once and for all she was the superior minion.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Unicron:
> > 
> > "How will ya do that???"Boomed the Unicron
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague/ Malice:
> > >  
> > > Hellplague took a confident step forward to address the 
> > Chaosbringer.
> > > "Not yet, but w were abl to find the Maximals' strong points 
and 
> > weaknesses.  We also were able to capture one of their best.  A 
> > bounty hunter with seemingly unparalelled skills.  He is able to 
> > absorb energy, and can heal any injury!  May I try and change 
him, 
> > to make him a loyal Minion?"
> > >  
> > > Malice struggled and finally set up straight.  The weights on 
> his 
> > wrists and ankles prevented him from going anywhere.  
> Blacknightmare 
> > had put some security over the room he was in, she obviously 
> didn't 
> > like him that much.  He looked around, trying to find something 
to 
> > use.  He tried to look behind him, but the weights prevente alot 
> of 
> > movement. 
> > > "Well, I suppose in order to complete this mission, I will 
have 
> to 
> > use unorthidox methods to do so."
> > > He then sat and waited, waited for his host to return.
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare/Unicron::
> > > 
> > > Blacknightmare conenected the alarms and an energi field 
> > sorrounded 
> > > him in order to avoid his scape.
> > > 
> > > Unicron's main room was circula, in midle of it was a 
Holograma 
> > > where appeared Unicron's Head. 
> > > 
> > > "Report!!!" commanded Unicron"Have you destroyed Maximals?????"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Hellplague/ Malice:
> > > >  
> > > > Hellplague glared at Blacknightmare.  She got off of Malice 
> and 
> > > walked out of the room.
> > > > "You're just jealous." she said before flying to the main 
> > > chamber.  
> > > > Necross and Splattercanon were already waiting. 
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Unicron:
> > > > 
> > > > Unicron's voice sounded trought speakers "COme my minions to 
> > main 
> > > Room, I want to heard your report"
> > > > 
> > > > BlackNightmare whose was behind Hellplague said 
> sarcastically"I 
> > > hope that Unicron doesn't get mad when he knows about your 
> little 
> > > pet"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Malice/ Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Necross:
> > > > >  
> > > > > Malice was in stasis lock when Splattercannon exited the 
> > > > atmosphere.  Thus he was spared the pain of the sub zero 
> > > tempatures 
> > > > of space.  The minions returned to Unicron, and after 
closing 
> > the 
> > > > airlock, Splattercannon transformed, dumping Malice on the 
> > > ground.  
> > > > Hellplague and Splattercannon drag his battered body to a 
> room, 
> > > > someone's quarters, and dumped him on a bed.  His left 
> shoulder 
> > > was 
> > > > nearly severed, and his joints, where a signifigant amount 
of 
> > semi 
> > > > organic flesh was, were worn and thinned.  Hellplague look 
> > > > disapprovingly at the sight and then turned to 
Splattercannon.
> > > > > "I want you and Necross to re- energize him, and see if 
you 
> > can 
> > > > repair him.  I must go and tend to the Sweeps."
> > > > > Splattercannon nodded and beckoned Necross to enter.  For 
a 
> > > moment 
> > > > they both looked down at the battered and bound hunter 
before 
> > them.
> > > > > "Just get a pile of energon cubes and dump them here," 
> Necross 
> > > > said before turning to leave.
> > > > > Splattercannon grabbed the Minion by the shoulder before 
> > > > addressing him.
> > > > > "But Hellplague told us to repair him.  For whatever 
> purpose, 
> > > she 
> > > > wants him alive."
> > > > > Necross scofted before shaking his shoulder free from his 
> > > > companion's grip.
> > > > > "Not my problem."
> > > > > Splattercannon fumed a moment as Necross set off for parts 
> of 
> > > > Unicron unknown, then proceeded to the nearest enegon 
> storage.  
> > He 
> > > > gathered an armfull of cubes and brought them back to 
Malice's 
> > new 
> > > > residence.  He dumped them all around the hunter and went to 
> the 
> > > > Repair bay to nurse his own injuries.
> > > > > Malice finally came back online.  His vision was blurred 
> > > somewhat, 
> > > > but the familiar hum of energon cubes was made him more 
> alert.  
> > He 
> > > > tied to sit up, but his left arm was pinned under him, so he 
> > > settled 
> > > > for wiggling over to the closest cube.  He touched his foot 
to 
> > it, 
> > > > and began absorbing the energy from it.  His shoulder 
> immediatly 
> > > > began to heal itself.  He set up and tried to break his 
bonds, 
> > but 
> > > > they were nearly unbreakable.  He scooted forward and 
touched 
> > > > several cubes.  He quickly healed the rest of his body and 
> > scooted 
> > > > to the edge of the bed. He was about to try and stand up 
when 
> > > > Hellplague pranced in.  She walked over and pushed him back 
> onto 
> > > the 
> > > > bed.  She put what looked like gravitity weights on his 
ankles 
> > and 
> > > > then unbound his feet.  She repeated the same proceedure on 
> his 
> > > > wrists.  She then smiled and hit a button on her comm link 
and 
> > > > Malice was pinned to the bed.  He tried to get up, but his 
> arms 
> > > and 
> > > > legs were not going anywhere.  Hellplague smiled and 
straddled 
> > the
> > > > >  hunter's mid section, leaning forward and supporting 
> herself 
> > > with 
> > > > her arms resting on his chest.  
> > > > > "Now, I think you had better just be an obediant little 
> lizard 
> > > and 
> > > > stay here where I can watch you."
> > > > > She leaned down until her face was inches from his.
> > > > > "Or else I may have to 'disipline' you."she added with a 
> > devious 
> > > > smirk.
> > > > > <Tag minions>
> > > > > 
> > > > >
